column2: "<%me>, we're ARKS. We're different from them, right?"
"You two are both too sincere, thinking about your enemy's circumstances. But I suppose that's admirable."
"I have one policy, destroy anything that stands in my way."
"It doesn't matter what other people think, I just do what I need to."
"Worrying and pondering are things you can do while you're young. And you should."
"But, I will say one thing, don't be swayed by the opinions of others."
"The only one that can decide what you should do, is yourself."
"It doesn't do any good standing around chatting, I'm returning base."
